DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect whole-body vibration plasma sclerostin level healthy young adult woman . Fifteen healthy young adult woman plan include study . All case train whole-body vibration ( WBV ) platform ( Power Plate ) 5 time week one week period . Training duration short beginning progress slowly . The amplitude vibration 2 mm frequency vibration 40 Hz . The subject ask report negative side effect adverse reaction train diary . Previbration postvibration ( , 10.minute 30.minute ) level plasma sclerostin measure first , second fifth day experiment . Sclerostin level measure human sclerostin ELISA kit .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Whole-Body Vibration Plasma Sclerostin Level
DOC.detailed_description: Whole-body vibration strong osteogenic effect . The cyclic mechanical load bone stimulate osteocyte . Sclerostin , protein product SOST gene , osteocyte-specific cysteine knot-secreted glycoprotein potent inhibitor bone formation . Sost/sclerostin level report reduced mechanical stimulation . The aim study investigate effect whole-body vibration plasma sclerostin level healthy young adult woman .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman , Women age vary 20 40 year Righthanded woman Lower extremity problem 1 . Orthopedic problem : shortness leg , congenital anomaly , etc . 2 . Joint disease ( arthritis , joint prosthesis , etc . ) 3 . Other painful pathology low extremity ( fracture , tendinitis , bursitis , etc . ) 4 . Circulation problem low extremity Dorsolumbar disease : Vertebral fract , disc hernia , spondylodiskitis , etc . Systemic disease case 1 . Systemic bone disease : osteoporosis , osteomalacia , Paget 's disease 2 . Hypertension ( > 135 mmHg systolic , > 85 mmHg diastolic ) 3 . Heart dis . ( coronary dis , conduction/rhythm prob , cardiac pacemaker ) 4 . Infectious diseases 5 .
